node.name: Classic Bean Bag MAKE: SKYSHOT
node.description: It is observed, furniture’s that bought online are mostly come with some defect. With initial some failures the manufacturer of this bean bag came with the effective product for children. Bonded leather is stitched with machine and cross examined by quality in-charge before dispatch. (SIZE: XXXL / WEIGHT: 3 Kg / FILLER: Polystyrene pellets)
node.content: 1> Bean bags were easy to handle and they can't hurt children with their smooth pseudo shape /2> Well solid furniture’s are boring after a few users and its difficult for children to relocate them but bean bags can be drag from one corner to another /3> XXXL size is for medium size person and children of age 4 to 10 with weight of 25-30 Kg can sit on it with maximum comfort /4> Up to half of its size is filled with Polystyrene pellets, compressing age of more than 1 year /5> Provide cushion type comfort like expensive sofa and waterproof bonded leather increase its durability /6> Different colours option are also available and carrying strap is provided at top.
node.alt: Skyshot Classic Bean Bag Filled with BeansFillers XXXL Maroon

node.name: Super sports Combo MAKE: SUNSHINE GIFTING
node.description: Superior product and full package of gaming items, made up of plastic material but doesn't feel cheap at all. Quality of cricket set is good, also 10 numbers of shuttlecocks are provided. Football is ideal for senior, junior of all age group and can be played in training matches as well. (FOR: 3-10 year / NO OF GAME: 3 / MATERIAL: Solid Plastic & Nylon Rubber)
node.content: 1> Off course a single game cost more and that’s why to satisfy the requirement of multiple kids in the family, this 3 in 1 gaming package is provided /2> Cricket kit, Badminton Kit, and Football are provided that can be used indoor and outdoor /3> Cricket kit is made with high-density plastic and ball with synthetic rubber which are hard to break /4> Double shaft model of badminton rackets provide extra comfort and 10 pieces of nylon shuttle are durable and waterproof /5> Strong rubber bladder for excellent air and shape retention of football, synthetic leather covering so that played outside /6> Effective gift for young kids who get bored from a single game, also all product is made in India, therefore, quality is not compromised.
node.alt: Toyshine 3 in 1 Super Sports Combo for Age 37 Years  Cricket  Badminton  Football  Multi Color

node.name: TV-Sub game box MAKE: INFINIZY
node.description: Built-in 400 classic games with backlit function of the screen ensure players can play everywhere and in television too. Console is slim, portable and trendy. Powerful rechargeable battery pack, includes an AC adapter & a lithium-ion battery. Include retro arcade games, logic & math, sports, puzzle, shooting, action and many more. (FOR: 4-10 year / WARRANTY: 1 Year)
node.content: 1> Handheld game for age group 4-10 year with the ability to mesmerize child for long hours /2> 400 games are categorized in the retro concept of the '90s, logic & math, sports, puzzle, shooting, action, racing, fighting, strategy, adventure /3> AV external interface support video output that can be directly connected to TV and computer display as well /4> Medium graphics does not harm the eyesight as compare to current era high definition game and also not addictive in nature /5> Rechargeable battery pack ensure the back up of 6 hours in off-mode & continuous play /6> Suitable birthday gift or holiday present for growing kids in the family, mini-game console that can fit any hand and 3 inches screen, slim-enough to carry around.
node.alt: Infinizy Buy 1 GET 1 Free 400 in 1 Handheld Sup Game Box Classic Game Machine with Remote for All Kids Compatible All TV

node.name: Multipurpose Baby wardrobe MAKE: FLIPZON
node.description: Wardrobe keeps the environment around kids clean and hygienic by keeping all the things like clothes at one place. Easy to assemble & easy to relocate with carrying capacity up to 30 Kg. 6 shelves of medium carton size made with unbreakable material and outer covering of poly cotton fabric. (SIZE: 460x300x1490mm / WEIGHT: 3.5 Kg / VOLUME: 7.5 CubicFeet)
node.content: 1> DIY(Do it yourself) product that can be assembled within 10 minutes of time with space for every essential article that required by 4-6-year-old child /2> Two side pockets for extra storage of small products like handkerchief or medicines /3> With heavy-duty castor wheel it is easy to relocate including carrying the weight of 30 Kg /4> Poly cotton fabric is easy to remove using zip and can be hand washed /5> No tools required to assemble or dismantle and ideal solution for tenant parents to store clothes, shoes, books, and toys of their children /6> Reviewed from many middle-class parents regarding the durability, on which they comment the product is suitable for small children that can also help to teach management of their clothes.
node.alt: FLIPZON Multipurpose 6 Shelve Baby Wardrobe Foldable Unbreakable Material Blue

node.name: MySmart kid worksheets MAKE: MOTHERING
node.description: It is proven fact that children learn quickly in their formative years than at any time in their life. Series of 100 worksheets to make the foundational concepts easy and intriguing in a enjoyable format. Develop logical, lingual, analytical and problem-solving capabilities of child which in result will mould confidence. (NO OF WOKSHEETS: 100 / WORKSHEET PAGES: 85 / TYPE: BOTH SIDE WRITING)
node.content: 1> It take too much effort to teach children how to write the alphabets and numbers and that’s why worksheets play a role in the first step of learning /2> Dotted stencils of alphabets and numbers enable the self-learning writing concept with just little effort of guidance /3> Additional worksheets on small mathematics problems, addition and subtraction is based on the picturise format for example 1 apple + 1 apple equals to 2 apples /4> Speed learning is better than accuracy in these days of the digital world and therefore any parents support with maximum capabilities /5> Very essential books for pre-school as per survey of more than 100 schools.
node.alt: My Smart Kid 100 Worksheets Pack 2 6 Years  Math & Logic English Science Habits Games & Activities

node.name: Runner skate scooter MAKE: GOODLUCK BAYBEE
node.description: SmartSmart scooter for a smooth ride to young road runners of age 4-10 year. Easy to fold mechanism so that can be placed in compact storage. 3 level adjustable height for the age 4-year, 7 year and 10-year-old kids. Non-slip handle and friction grip brakes for safety at wet surface. (SIZE: 820x260x670mm / WEIGHT: 3.2 Kg / MATERIAL: Aluminium) scooter for smooth ride to young road runners of age 4-10 year. Easy to fold mechanism so that can be placed in compact storage. 3 level adjustable height for the age 4-year, 7 year and 10-year-old kids. Non-slip handle and friction grip brakes for safety at wet surface. (SIZE: 820x260x670mm / WEIGHT: 3.2 Kg / MATERIAL: Aluminium)
node.content: 1> Design as per European standards which include safety at every point for toddlers to grown-up babies with age 10 years/2> Aluminium material can hold up to 75 Kg of weight and provide swift balance when lean to steer /3> Handle height can be adjusted to 3 different positions from 2 feet to 3 feet so that this scooter remains in use for the grown-up kid as well /4> Tyres are made with styrene-butadiene rubber which is durable like tractor tyres and show maximum grip on both dry & wet surface /5> Intelligent turning that keep balance easily by physical incline and rear brake design to stop the scooter quickly without jerk /6> Recognized scooter for foster kids with more than 1000 satisfied customers.
node.alt: GoodLuck Baybee Runner Skate Scooter for Kids Baby Runner Scooter with Adjustable Height Foldable PU Wheels and Weight Capacity 60 Kids for Babies Boys & Girls 3 to 12 Years Blue
